project_descr: This project is part of the second generation of Biodiversity Enabling Activities (BD EA) under the GEF. Ecuador has been Party to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) since February 23, 1993.

outputs.output_descr: National Biodiversity Planning to Support the implementation of the CBD 2011-2020 Strategic Plan in Ecuador

document_name: Documento de proyecto Estrategia Nacional de Biodiversidad
